description: With Ignite UI, developers can create next generation, browser-based, touch-enabled tablet, mobile & desktop experiences.  At its core, Ignite UI is a set of full-featured, high-performance HTML & JavaScript user interface controls based on jQuery Core, jQuery UI and jQuery Mobile JavaScript libraries. Ignite UI also includes MVC & ASP.NET server-side wrappers. On top of that, Ignite UI features a set of Mobile controls with adaptive CSS, which you can use for your iPhone, Android & Windows Phone applications.
name: Ignite UI
